root.name: Heavy Weapon: Atomic Tank
root.description: OverviewHeavy Weapon is a dual-stick shooter, but unlike most games of this type, your "ship" (tank) remains on a flat surface on the bottom of the screen and can only shoot above or to it's sides.Â The objective of the game is to shoot down enemy planes, tanks, and missiles while avoiding their attacks.Modes MissionTry to survive 19 stages with increasing difficulty.SurvivalTry to last as long as possible.Boss BattleFight every boss in the game one by one.UpgradesDefense OrbsSpheres that circle around your tank and block enemy attacks, excluding lasers.Homing MissileAnti-aircraft missiles that lock on to an enemy ship.LaserFires in a straight line for high damage.RocketsFire randomly in the air, hopefully hitting an enemy ship.Flak CannonInstantly destroys any ships that get within it's range.LightningBolts that shoot from your tank and can leap from enemy to enemy.
